Comments_List: Solid basis for corporate finance topics
Key valuation methods and basic understanding of various capital structures
Very informative but the three hour lecture style lends itself to the student tuning out towards the end of the lectures

Strengths: great slides and course organization. Problem sets are well-designs for consolidate understanding of course material, and the exams are fair.

Weaknesses: can cover topics more in depth or include a final project of actually valuing a company
If youre going into business of any kind this class is fundamental
Yes, you learn a lot about corporate Finance without being drowned in work. Professor Kelly Shue explains concepts very clearly.
